summary: While people in Western Europe were used to choose between hundreds of brands, the communist Romanian used to have a different experience: all our life we lived with only one brand for each... See full summary Â»
cast: Mihaela Andrei|Viorel Andrei|Gheorghe Banu|Ileana Banu|Gheorghe Barbulescu|Maria Barbulescu|Constantin Batar|Marian Bunea|Silvia Dornauer|Edy Grosu|Viorel Grosu|Alex Hermeneanu|Gelu Hermeneanu|Elena Mihaiu|Ioan Mihaiu|Georgeta Nanu|Alexandru Pascale|Constantin Postelnicu|Ioana Radulesu|Ecaterina Rosu|Puiu Stefan|Tora Stefan|Aurel Voicu
title: Metrobranding
